Every day at midnight, you receive 1000 BIFS 3. After the time ends, mining automatically stops 📈 Example calculation: • Activation: 700 Stars • Income for 7 days: 7000 BIFS (1000×7) 🔁 Extension: You can extend unlimited times Each extension adds the purchased number of mining days ⚠️ Important: If not extended on time, mining stops Accumulated BIFS remain in your balance

infoSections.howToStart: ✨ How to Start: ✨ 🚀 1. Type the /start command or click the button below - This will start the registration process. 🎉 2. Registration will happen automatically - You don't need to enter additional data. 🎁 3. Receive a 50-token bonus - Your starting bonus is already waiting for you! 📱 4. Follow the link: - Launch Mini-App 😍 5. Complete activities: - Play games, invite friends, open cases and collections, advertise us, find Easter eggs!
infoSections.tokensInfo: ✨ How to Get Tokens: ✨ 📌 You can earn tokens in the following ways: 1. 🎮 Playing games — Earn tokens by completing levels and in-game tasks. 2. 📝 Completing tasks — Complete daily and special tasks for rewards. 3. 🤝 Inviting friends — Get bonuses for each invited friend. 4. 📢 Advertising us — Share information about the project and earn tokens for activity. 💡 Every action earns you BIFS tokens!
infoSections.tokensValue: ✨ BIFS Token Value: ✨ 💎 BIFS tokens are your currency in the BIFS world! 📌 What you can do with tokens: 1. 🛠 Purchase upgrades - Improve your capabilities in games and apps. 2. 🚀 Get exclusive features - Unlock access to unique functions and content. 3. 💼 Invest in the future - In the future, BIFS tokens can be exchanged for real assets. 4. 🎁 Receive bonuses - Use tokens to participate in promotions and receive gifts. 💡 BIFS tokens are not just currency, they are the key to new opportunities!
infoSections.earnInfo: ✨ About Earning from Advertising: ✨ 📌 We value your support and are ready to reward you for promoting our project! 🎯 Here's how it works: 1. 🎮 Create content - Write posts, shoot videos (TikTok, Shorts), make memes, or even distribute flyers. - Anything that draws attention to our project earns you tokens! 2. 📝 Get views - The more people see your content, the more tokens you earn. 3. 🤝 Submit a report - Go to our bot, "Earn" section, and click "Attach Report." - Select Attach Report. 4. 📢 Attach: - A link to your content. - A screenshot with the number of views. - Information on how to contact you. MANDATORY start the report text with the word: bif-report: 💡 We will check your activity and credit tokens. The more creative your content, the more you earn!
infoSections.inviteInfo: 🤝 Inviting Friends: 🎉 Invite friends and get bonuses! - For each invited friend, you will receive additional tokens. - Your friends will also receive bonuses for registration. 💡 How it works: 1. Share your referral link with friends. 2. After your friend registers, you will receive tokens in your balance. 3. The more friends you invite, the more tokens you earn! 🚀 Start inviting friends now!
infoSections.tasksInfo: 🤝 Complete: 🎉 Here you can view your tasks, which can be completed in the app! 😊 How it works: 1. You complete a task. 2. The bot or manager checks it. 3. You receive tokens!
infoSections.goals: ✨ Our Goals: ✨ 🎯 We strive to become one of the leading projects in the cryptocurrency world! 📌 Our key goals: 1. 🌐 Listing on major exchanges - We plan to launch on platforms like BLUM, STON.fi DEX, BYBIT, and Binance. 2. 🚀 Ecosystem development - We are actively working on adding new games, tasks, and features. 3. 🤝 Creating a global community - We want to unite people worldwide around our project. 4. 💡 Convenience and accessibility - We make cryptocurrency simple and understandable for everyone. 💡 We are confidently moving toward these goals and invite you to be part of our success!
infoSections.aboutBot: ✨ About BIF Bot: ✨ 🤖 Our Telegram bot is your assistant in the BIFS world! 📌 Main bot functions: 1. 🪙 Earning tokens - Complete tasks, play games, and earn tokens. 2. 🤝 Inviting friends - Invite friends and get bonuses for each invited person. 3. 🛠 Account management - Check your balance, transaction history, and auto-mining status. 4. 📢 Advertising and promotion - Earn tokens for promoting the project. 5. 🎮 Games and tasks - Participate in games and complete tasks for rewards. 💡 With the BIF bot, you're always up to date and can easily manage your assets!
infoSections.commands: 📜 Basic Commands: 🚀 /start — Start working with the bot. 🛒 /store — Go to the store to purchase tokens and services. 💰 /balance — Check your current token balance. 🌎 /lang — Switch language. 💸 /earn — View the list of available tasks. 🤝 /invite — Invite friends and get bonuses. 💎 /mining — Information about auto-mining. 🆘 /support — Contact support. 💡 Use these commands to manage your account and earn tokens!
